content:
Lamet family

1 Judy LAMED                         - before 1812
 + Chaja                             - 1812 #108 (Izaak+Sara)
  2x Szyia Sussla LAMET              1787-89
    + Raisli                         1792-95 (Hersz)
     3x Izaak LAMET                  1811-16 - Feb 29, 1884 #83
       + Ester Raizel SCHWARTZ       1813 - 1846 #358
        4o Sussel Lea LAMET          Feb-Mar 1836 (1837 #6)
          * Jakob Fischel DEMBITZER  1834 #264
                married Nov 17, 1885 #103
              FAMILY LISTING
        4o Chaja Feigel LAMET        Dec 13, 1838 (1839 #133)

                married Dec 28, 1892 #191

             * Abraham Izrael FRANZBLAU  Jaslo
                   banns 1913 #250
           5x son LAMEL (twin)       Jul 31 (Aug 11), 1887 #662 - Aug 9, 1887 #311

          + Rachel GOLDFINGER

          * unknown

        4x Salomon LAMET             - 1853 #275
